name: Snack 'N' Jack
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/snack-n-jack

Controls:

WASD to move

Left-Click to shoot

Hold 'E' to show gun menu or 1, 2, 3, 4 to switch weapons

DEFEND!

Jack is stuck in an infinite nightmare! Fend off the treacherous shadow creatures with your most deadly weapon... candy (chips and fire are also included)! These shadowy beasts won't stop at anything. Even their Dad won't let up!

MULTIPLE WEAPONS

With more than 4 weapons to choose from, you are bound to eat through your ammo (literally) and destroy all the enemies in their path. Even if you are very unskilled when it comes to handling recoil..

IT'S GOING OUT!

The campfire is going out as the shadow monsters converge. Don't let the darkness consume you and your campsite. Decimate your enemies and push back the shadows.

HARDCORE EXPERIENCE

As you progress, more advanced waves will be introduced. All whilst you can only be hit ONCE! This is bound to give you intense experiences of gameplay. Good luck, you will most likely need it!

CHANGE LOG

- Fixed bug where you could no longer progress after first wave.

- Fixed bug where tutorial would repeat every time you died
